name: Sword of the Mighty
description: A powerful sword that exudes an aura of strength and power.
looks: The Sword of the Mighty is a large two-handed sword with a razor-sharp blade. The hilt is made of polished steel and adorned with intricate engravings.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Increases damage dealt with swords by 10%

special_effects.mighty_strike: Has a chance to deal double damage on each swing

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword for melee combat.
looks: The iron sword has a simple straight blade and a hilt with a leather grip.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The sword has a simple design with a hilt made of leather and a blade made of iron.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a simple hilt with a crossguard and a straight blade that measures about 3 feet in length.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a long, straight blade with a simple hilt. It has a dull gray color.

special_weapon_skils.Swordsmanship: Allows the player to use the sword more effectively.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The sword has a hilt wrapped in leather and a straight blade with a slight curve near the tip.

name: Sword of Flames
description: A powerful sword imbued with the power of fire.
looks: The sword has a long, silver blade with intricate engravings. The hilt is adorned with red gems that seem to glow with inner fire.

special_weapon_skills.fire_sword: Allows the wielder to perform special fire-based sword techniques.

special_effects.flame_strike: Has a chance to engulf enemies in flames on hit.

description: A basic sword made of iron
looks: The sword has a simple design with a straight blade and a hilt made of leather

looks: The sword has a simple, straight blade made of iron, with a hilt wrapped in leather.

name: Sword of the Brave
description: A powerful sword that boosts the courage of its wielder.
looks: The sword has a gleaming blade with intricate engravings. The hilt is adorned with a lion's head.

special_effects.courage: Boosts the courage of the wielder, providing a temporary bonus to defense.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The sword has a straight blade with a slightly worn hilt

name: Sword of Fire
description: A blazing sword imbued with the power of fire.
looks: The sword has a long and slender blade with flame-like patterns running along its surface. The hilt is made of blackened steel with a fiery gem embedded in it.

special_effects.fire_attack: Has a chance to burn enemies on hit

name: Iron Sword
looks: The iron sword has a simple design with a plain hilt and a straight blade.

name: Potion of Healing
description: A magical potion that restores a small amount of health.
looks: A small vial filled with glowing red liquid.
